text: (ratran, ridi adi) dæya nira ginnen rat pæhæ gænvena turu rat kara, emagin ovunge nalal valada, ilaæta pedesvalada, ovunge pita kondehida pulussa ‘oba venuven oba ekkasu kara tæbu dæya meyayi. ebævin oba ekkasu kara tibu meva (podiyak) vinda balanu’ yayi kiyanu labana dina (nabiye! oba ovunta matak kara denu)
